title: I main Orianna and Ekko who should be my 3rd main.
body: I need help since i want a complete set,so can anyone give me any recommendations. No supports or tanks please.

replies.body: If you're looking for a third mid, you should find someone that covers Ori/Ekko's weaknesses. I don't know their matchups that well, so I can't recommend you a specific person. However, if you know a certain group or a certain couple champions give both your mains trouble, find a champion that counters those so you always have a good answer if you get counterpick.

Personally, I'd pick someone to know for those times you don't get your lane. I main ADC with Cait and Ashe, but I'm also good with Leona for those times I get support.

{{champion:51}}
What is a complete set, exactly?  Ori and Ekko are very different champions..
not necessarily. They both have a returning skill shot and a shield.
Lissandra? Has ways into a fight, ways out of a fight, strong CC ult that can double as a reset button.
